title: The Soccer Tryouts
setting: A dusty soccer field with colorful graffiti on the walls
learning_or_struggle: Aarav pushes himself during tryouts to show his skills

title: The Library Showdown
setting: The school library with old dusty books and a cozy reading nook
learning_or_struggle: Aarav argues with his friend over a book they both want to borrow

title: The Science Fair Disaster
setting: The school gym filled with colorful science projects and bubbling potions
learning_or_struggle: Aarav's volcano project erupts early, causing a mess at the science fair

title: The Friendship Pact
setting: Aarav's backyard with a makeshift treehouse and a tire swing
